headline: Citigroup Nears Banamex Spin-Off Amid Organizational Overhaul
summary: C nears divesting Banamex as part of its restructuring efforts to exit the retail banking business in some markets and invest in sectors with high potential.

raw.headline: Citigroup Nears Banamex Spin-Off Amid Organizational Overhaul
raw.summary: C nears divesting Banamex as part of its restructuring efforts to exit the retail banking business in some markets and invest in sectors with high potential.

headline: Citi completes split of Mexico business ahead of Banamex IPO
summary: The move to split Grupo Financiero Citi México from Grupo Financiero Banamex is part of Citi's sweeping overhaul under CEO Jane Fraser aimed at simplifying its sprawling structure as it looks to improve the bank's performance.  The New York-based bank is continuing to work on the proposed initial public offering of Banamex, the timing of which will depend on regulatory approvals and market conditions, Citi said.

raw.headline: Citi completes split of Mexico business ahead of Banamex IPO

headline: Citi Splits Mexico Business With 93% of Staff Headed for IPO
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Plans are advancing for an initial public offering of Citigroup Inc.’s Banamex business in Mexico after the bank finished separating out the division from its broader institutional offerings in the country. headline: Citi separates Mexico retail ops from institutional business
summary: The move sets up the bank to spin off Banamex in an IPO, as planned. The timing of that will depend on regulatory approval, but the bank has long targeted next year.

headline: China Manufacturing PMI Gauge Signals Pickup in Growth
summary: A private gauge of China’s manufacturing activity signaled that the sprawling sector continued to expand in November, as Beijing’s efforts to revive growth help stabilize the economy.
